title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 281.1 - Scope of part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 281.1 - Scope of part

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part shall apply only to an appeal to
the Commissioner of Education pursuant to Education Law section 3020(3), which
authorizes the City School District of the City of New York and any employee
organization representing employees or titles that are or were covered by any
memorandum of agreement executed by such city school district and the Council
of Supervisors and Administrators of the City of New York on or after December
1, 1999 to negotiate agreements that modify or replace the provisions of

Education Law sections 3020-a and 2590-j(7) and directs the commissioner to
review appeals brought according to the terms of such
agreements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
281.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
